amendment.description: To prohibit any foreign-government-owned or controlled company that recognized the Taliban as the legitimate government of Afghanistan during the Taliban's rule between 1996 - 2001, may own, lease, operate, or mange real property or facility at a United States port.

action.text: Proposed amendment SA 2959 withdrawn in Senate.

Amendment SA 2959 proposed by Senator Schumer to Amendment SA 2944. (consideration: CR S1881; text: CR S1881) To prohibit any foreign-government-owned or controlled company that recognized the Taliban as the legitimate government of Afghanistan during the Taliban's rule between 1996 - 2001, may own, lease, operate, or mange real property or facility at a United States port.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2959 proposed by Senator Schumer to Amendment SA 2944.
